Class AppointmentRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.AppointmentRepository
public class AppointmentRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing appointments in the hospital system. This class provides functionalities to load, save, and manipulate appointment data stored in an Excel file. It supports scheduling, updating, and retrieving appointment details for doctors and patients.
Since:
2024-11-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
LI LIYI

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor

    AppointmentRepository()
    Initializes the repository by loading all appointments from the Excel file.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentRepository

      public AppointmentRepository() throws IOException
      Initializes the repository by loading all appointments from the Excel file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the Excel file.

  • Method Details

    • getAppointmentList

      public List<model.Appointment> getAppointmentList()
      Retrieves all appointments from the repository.
      Returns:
      a list of all appointments.

    • getPatientListOfDoctor

      public List<String> getPatientListOfDoctor(String doctorId)
      Retrieves a list of patients associated with a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor.
      Returns:
      a list of patient IDs.

    • getDoctorSchedule

      public List<model.Appointment> getDoctorSchedule(model.Doctor doctor, LocalDate dateChoice)
      Retrieves the schedule for a specific doctor on a given date.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose schedule is being retrieved.
      dateChoice - the date for which the schedule is being retrieved.
      Returns:
      a list of appointments for the specified doctor and date.

    • getUpcomingAppointmentsForPatient

      public List<model.Appointment> getUpcomingAppointmentsForPatient(model.Patient patient)
      Retrieves a list of upcoming appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient whose upcoming appointments are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      a list of upcoming appointments for the patient.

    • getAvailableTimeSlots

      public List<LocalTime> getAvailableTimeSlots(String doctorId, LocalDate date)
      Retrieves available time slots for a specific doctor on a given date.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor.
      date - the date for which time slots are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a list of available time slots as LocalTime objects.

    • bookAppointment

      public void bookAppointment(String patientId, String doctorId, LocalDate date, LocalTime time) throws IOException
      Books an appointment for a patient with a specific doctor on a given date and time.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient.
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor.
      date - the date of the appointment.
      time - the time of the appointment.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while saving the updated appointment data.

    • freeAppointmentSlot

      public void freeAppointmentSlot(model.Appointment appointmentToFree) throws IOException
      Frees an appointment slot, marking it as available for scheduling.
      Parameters:
      appointmentToFree - the appointment to be freed.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while saving the updated appointment data.

    • getAppointmentById

      public model.Appointment getAppointmentById(int appointmentId) throws IOException
      Retrieves an appointment by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment.
      Returns:
      the appointment with the specified ID, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while accessing the appointment data.
